key.name: card
key.summary: Type of Hardware Interface, choice of: no: data analysis mode (hardware disabled, simulation mode). Generic Hardware PlugIn (HwI) Selection: XXX:SPM (SPM comandset), XXX:SPA (SPA-LEED like), and others, SRanger:SPM (old SoftdB Signal Ranger DSP model MK1 (-STD/-SP2) -- obsolete, SRangerMK2:SPM (SoftdB Signal Ranger DSP model MK2 and MK3 autodetected, XXX:ccd: special ParPort CCD Cam. TC211 (CCD comandset)
key.description: Type of Hardware Interface, choice of: no: data analysis mode (hardware disabled, simulation mode). Generic Hardware PlugIn (HwI) Selection: XXX:SPM (SPM comandset), XXX:SPA (SPA-LEED like), and others, SRanger:SPM (old SoftdB Signal Ranger DSP model MK1 (-STD/-SP2) -- obsolete, SRangerMK2:SPM (SoftdB Signal Ranger DSP model MK2 and MK3 autodetected, XXX:ccd: special ParPort CCD Cam. TC211 (CCD comandset)

key.name: device
key.summary: DSP Character Device Path for DSP based Hardware Interfaces: ignored in case of HardwareType=no old Signal Ranger SP2/STD use: /dev/sranger0 Signal Ranger MK2 and MK3 specify the first device to start auto detecting: /dev/sranger_mk2_0
key.description: DSP Character Device Path for DSP based Hardware Interfaces: ignored in case of HardwareType=no old Signal Ranger SP2/STD use: /dev/sranger0 Signal Ranger MK2 and MK3 specify the first device to start auto detecting: /dev/sranger_mk2_0

key.name: type
key.summary: Type of Instrument, choices are: STM, AFM, SARLS, SPALEED, ELSLEED, CCD, SCMA
key.description: Type of Instrument, choices are: STM, AFM, SARLS, SPALEED, ELSLEED, CCD, SCMA

key.name: worldsizenxy
key.summary: Width and height of world map in pixles
key.description: Width and height of world map in pixles

key.name: x-piezo-av
key.summary: Unit: [Å/V] STM/AFM: X Piezo Sensitivity in Å/V
key.description: STM/AFM: X Piezo Sensitivity in Å/V

key.name: y-piezo-av
key.summary: Unit: [Å/V] STM/AFM: Y Piezo Sensitivity in Å/V
key.description: STM/AFM: Y Piezo Sensitivity in Å/V

key.name: z-piezo-av
key.summary: Unit: [Å/V] STM/AFM: Z Piezo Sensitivity in Å/V
key.description: STM/AFM: Z Piezo Sensitivity in Å/V

key.name: bias-gain
key.summary: Unit: [ ] STM/AFM: Bias Gain, Unit: 1 (gain between DAC-Bias-Volt and sample voltage)
key.description: STM/AFM: Bias Gain, Unit: 1 (gain between DAC-Bias-Volt and sample voltage)

key.name: bias-offset
key.summary: Unit: [V] STM/AFM: Bias Offset, Unit: V (offset = actual reading at DAC setting ZERO)
key.description: STM/AFM: Bias Offset, Unit: V (offset = actual reading at DAC setting ZERO)

key.name: nampere2volt
key.summary: Unit: [V/nA] STM/AFM: Tunnel Current Gain, Unit: V/nA
key.description: STM/AFM: Tunnel Current Gain, Unit: V/nA

key.name: nnewton2volt
key.summary: Unit: [V/nN] AFM: nano Newton to Volt calib. factor
key.description: AFM: nano Newton to Volt calib. factor

key.name: dhertz2volt
key.summary: Unit: [V/Hz] STM/AFM: delta Herz to Volt calib. factor. Set to ZERO for automatic internal PAC/PLL!
key.description: STM/AFM: delta Herz to Volt calib. factor. Set to ZERO for automatic internal PAC/PLL!

key.name: scanorgcenter
key.summary: bool: true=Offset is relative to center of scan, else center of top line
key.description: true GXSM OPTIONS=(false, bool: true=Offset is relative to center of scan, else center of top line)

key.name: scannerzpolarity
key.summary: MK3 only: select scanner Z polarity.
key.description: positive GXSM OPTIONS=(negative, MK3 only: select scanner Z polarity.)

key.name: dig-range-in
key.summary: Max AD Digital Value corresponding to Max Voltage
key.description: Max AD Digital Value corresponding to Max Voltage

key.name: dig-range-out
key.summary: Max DA Digital Value corresponding to Max Voltage
key.description: Max DA Digital Value corresponding to Max Voltage

key.name: volt-max-out
key.summary: Unit: [V] Max Voltage of DA [V] -- note: MK3-A810 new gen., else 10.0V.
key.description: Max Voltage of DA [V] -- note: MK3-A810 new gen., else 10.0V.

key.name: vx-default
key.summary: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by X-Channel
key.description: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by X-Channel

key.name: vy-default
key.summary: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Y-Channel
key.description: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Y-Channel

key.name: vz-default
key.summary: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Z-Channel
key.description: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Z-Channel

key.name: vx0-default
key.summary: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by X-Offset-Channel
key.description: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by X-Offset-Channel

key.name: vy0-default
key.summary: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Y-Offset-Channel
key.description: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Y-Offset-Channel

key.name: vz0-default
key.summary: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Z-Offset-Channel
key.description: Default Amplifier Positionindex [0,1,2,..8] used by Z-Offset-Channel

key.name: analog-offset-adding
key.summary: Offset adding modus for piezo amplifier: choose from: 'DSP offset adding': false 'Analog offset adding': true
key.description: true GXSM OPTIONS=(false, Offset adding modus for piezo amplifier: choose from: 'DSP offset adding': false 'Analog offset adding': true)

key.name: ampmodulationgains
key.summary: setup HV Amplifier modulation input gains -- used for Z slope compensation
key.description: setup HV Amplifier modulation input gains -- used for Z slope compensation

key.name: xcalibv
key.summary: SPALEED: X Calibration factor 1V am DA => +/-10V/15V at oktopol rear/front
key.description: SPALEED: X Calibration factor 1V am DA => +/-10V/15V at oktopol rear/front

key.name: ycalibv
key.summary: SPALEED: Y Calibration factor 1V am DA => +/-10V/15V at oktopol rear/front
key.description: SPALEED: Y Calibration factor 1V am DA => +/-10V/15V at oktopol rear/front

key.name: thetachgunint
key.summary: Unit: [°] SPA-LEED: half angle between E-gun and Channeltron in internal Geom.
key.description: SPA-LEED: half angle between E-gun and Channeltron in internal Geom.

key.name: thetachgunext
key.summary: Unit: [°] SPA-LEED: half angle between E-gun and Channeltron in external Geom.
key.description: SPA-LEED: half angle between E-gun and Channeltron in external Geom.

key.name: layerdist
key.summary: Unit: [Å] SPA_LEED: Sample Layer Distance d0 [A] - used for Phase S calculations
key.description: SPA_LEED: Sample Layer Distance d0 [A] - used for Phase S calculations

key.name: unitlen
key.summary: Unit: [Å] SPA-LEED: Sample Unit Cell Length a0 [A] - used for Phase K calibration
key.description: SPA-LEED: Sample Unit Cell Length a0 [A] - used for Phase K calibration

key.name: remotefifo
key.summary: path/name of remote control fifo, read cmds
key.description: path/name of remote control fifo, read cmds

key.name: remotefifoout
key.summary: path/name of remote control fifo, status out
key.description: path/name of remote control fifo, status out

key.name: pyremotefile
key.summary: path/name of python-remote file, without path and .py suffix, must be in cwd.
key.description: path/name of python-remote file, without path and .py suffix, must be in cwd.

key.name: gxsmpalette
key.summary: searchpath to Gxsm Palette Pixmaps (1024x1 ACSII .pnm)
key.description: searchpath to Gxsm Palette Pixmaps (1024x1 ACSII .pnm)

key.name: userpalette
key.summary: searchpath to additional Gxsm Palette Pixmaps (1024x1 ACSII .pnm)
key.description: searchpath to additional Gxsm Palette Pixmaps (1024x1 ACSII .pnm)

key.name: profilexcolorspath
key.summary: searchpath to optional list of XColors used for multiple profiles, file like rgb.txt or xcolors only)
key.description: searchpath to optional list of XColors used for multiple profiles, file like rgb.txt or xcolors only)

key.name: savewindowgeometry
key.summary: bool: true=save window positions, false: do not
key.description: true GXSM OPTIONS=(false, bool: true=save window positions, false: do not)

key.name: xyunit
key.summary: XY Unit alias, choose one of: AA (Å), nm, um (µm), mm, BZ, sec, V, 1
key.description: XY Unit alias, choose one of: AA (Å), nm, um (µm), mm, BZ, sec, V, 1

key.name: hilodelta
key.summary: Gridsize used by Autodisp, e.g: 1: all Pixels are examined
key.description: Gridsize used by Autodisp, e.g: 1: all Pixels are examined

key.name: smarthistepsilon
key.summary: Smart Histogram Epsilon for hitogram evaluanted range compression (positive) or expand (negative).
key.description: Smart Histogram Epsilon for hitogram evaluanted range compression (positive) or expand (negative).

key.name: profileloglimit
key.summary: Minimal Y value allwed in profile view in log view mode.
key.description: Minimal Y value allwed in profile view in log view mode.

key.name: autosaveunit
key.summary: Autosaveunit: Save every percent, lines, seconds
key.description: Autosaveunit: Save every percent, lines, seconds

key.name: autosavevalue
key.summary: Rate of Autosaves, depending on Unit.
key.description: Rate of Autosaves, depending on Unit.

key.name: autosaveoverwritemode
key.summary: true = Overwrite unasked during Autosave, false = ask before overwrite
key.description: true = Overwrite unasked during Autosave, false = ask before overwrite

key.name: loaddelay
key.summary: Delay after loading file in 1/10s: if zero no waiting for pending events.
key.description: Delay after loading file in 1/10s: if zero no waiting for pending events.

key.name: loadcorrectxyz
key.summary: set NC file load XYZ scale correction factor vector [Xs, Ys, ZsTopo, Zs*]. Default: no change, set to [1,1,1,1]. ZsTopo -- applies to Z of Topo dedicated data, Zs* to every thing else -- strongly advised to leave that at 1.XYZ scale correction factor vector [Xs, Ys, ZsTopo, Zs*]] is applied to scan scale (dx,dy,dz, rx,..) at NC-file load time once. This may be used to correct slight piezo calibartion deviations or temperature related scalings. Only on the fly applied at scan laod time. But you may save the file again, then it's applied.
key.description: set NC file load XYZ scale correction factor vector [Xs, Ys, ZsTopo, Zs*]. Default: no change, set to [1,1,1,1]. ZsTopo -- applies to Z of Topo dedicated data, Zs* to every thing else -- strongly advised to leave that at 1.XYZ scale correction factor vector [Xs, Ys, ZsTopo, Zs*]] is applied to scan scale (dx,dy,dz, rx,..) at NC-file load time once. This may be used to correct slight piezo calibartion deviations or temperature related scalings. Only on the fly applied at scan laod time. But you may save the file again, then it's applied.

key.name: slidercontroltype
key.summary: Slider/Approch control type: slider: Omicron Box/similar, single steps via DSP's digital IO, mover: Mover/Besocke via sawtooth like ramp voltages from Piezodrive
key.description: Slider/Approch control type: slider: Omicron Box/similar, single steps via DSP's digital IO, mover: Mover/Besocke via sawtooth like ramp voltages from Piezodrive

key.description: Path/name of your favorite palette, (1024x1 pnm RGB Bitmap (ascii))

key.description: true GXSM OPTIONS=(false, Accept Dat Kennung 0x000, Attention this is a safety hole if enabled !)

key.name: pcs-forceupdate
key.summary: true: Forces PCS Entry Value to update on any event/focus/click regardless value changed. (EXPERIMENTAL, not recommended for SRanger)
key.description: true: Forces PCS Entry Value to update on any event/focus/click regardless value changed. (EXPERIMENTAL, not recommended for SRanger) false: Onle updated Hardware (or calls ChangeNoticeFuntion()) when the value got actually changed.

key.name: layerfields
